reviews.review: Просто огромное кол-во матюкающихся первоклассников ,туча тупых карт ,бан за хэдшоты ...Игра уже не стоит своих денег ,но в следующей cs(go) это все исправлено

Ну это же старая добрая Counter-Strike, пусть не такая старая, как та же CS 1.6, но все же приятно иной раз поиграть с друзьями.

Думаю ничего рассказывать о gameplay'e вам не нужно, отмечу лишь, что тут весьма неплохая графика и система ачивок прикрученная к игре, стоит брать на распродаже комплектом

I decided I would revise this review again since I have now put more hours into it. I did not start with Source, but it is still a fun game to come back to every once in a while. You have to choose servers from a browser since there is no matchmaking system (which isnt a huge deal). The community hosts many different game-types ranging from some classic bomb scenario missions to fun minigames to play with others. I mainly stick to some bhop servers since it feels so fluid in this game compared to Global Offensive and I sometimes play on a classic or deathmatch server.
The guns in this game are LETHAL; You will die fast in this game, especially by the deagle since it is very accurate compared to CS:GO's version of it. I haven't invested time in learning the spray patterns in this game since they're different.
I think a big part of why this game still sells is that Garry's Mod needs it so you don't get missing textures and errors so much. Overall I'm happy with the game and play it at random times.

Pros:
Night vision

Cons:
None I can think of at this time.

This game is really fun because you can download new huds, weapon skin, and play on really cool servers that have zombies, servers where you can tdm, and it s really easy to bhop and surf. I don't have much to say about it, but it is a really fun game to have and useful for Gmod textures.

One night a guy takes his girlfriend home. As they are about to kiss each other goodnight at the front door, when the guy starts feeling a little horny.

With an air of confidence, he leans with his hand against the wall and smiling, he says to her, "Honey, would you give me a bj??

"Horrified, she replies, "Are you mad? My parents will see us!",
"Oh come on! Who's gonna see us at this hour?" he asks grinning at her.
"No, please. Can you imagine if we get caught?"
"Oh come on! there's nobody around, they're all sleeping!"
"No way. It's just too risky!"
"Oh please, please, I love you so much?!?"
"No, no, and no. I love you too, but I just can't!"
"Oh yes you can. Please?"
"No, no. I just can't" "I'm begging you??..."

Out of the blue, the light on the stairs goes on, and the girl's sister shows up in her pyjamas, hair dishevelled, and in a sleepy voice she says,

"Dad says to go ahead and give him a bj, or I can do it. Or if need be, mom will do it, or even dad.
But for God's sake tell him to take his fucking hand off the intercom!"

Now, as much as a lot of people sings the praise of the Counter Strike name alone, I for one don't buy it. I do not entirely understand why people call it "fun," persay. As you're probably noticed, I don't like the game.

Now, don't call me a hater yet. First, I'll explain what I think it gets right. In my personal opinion, kills are satisfying in this game. That feeling you get when you successfully kill someone is brilliant. That is... if you do.

The main issue I have with the game is just how unforgiving it is in almost every combat scenario. Far too often to I find myself spraying my gun towards an enemy at close range, not even getting close to killing him before he kills me with the same stunt. This doesn't just apply to that. This happens almost every time I tried shooting someone. More then once, I felt cheated out of a kill due to some reason I wasn't grasping. 

The fact that I can't seem to get any good amount of kills with any gun doesn't help matters for me. So, more often then not, I'm at the bottom of the scoreboard with a K/D of 0:5.

Now, I realize that this game isn't all about the guns. Leave Call of Duty to that. It has actual objectives which, for the most part, work out fine. You got hostage rescues, bomb defusals, and a variety of other custom gamemodes like Jailbreak and GunGame.

I also do like the majority of the blood effects for some odd reason. 

But with all of this games positives, I can't help but get turned off by the games unforgiving and sometimes borderline unfair gameplay for me. So, I do not reccommend.

(This review is purely subjective.)
